_templates.java.nio

Class ByteBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • _templates.java.nio.Buffer
      • _templates.java.nio.ByteBuffer

  • public final class ByteBuffer
extends Buffer
    Clean-room implementation of ByteBuffer to support javolution.util.Struct when java.nio is not available.
